snippet: The online video site said it now has four million paid subscribers, up from two million last year, even as two of its owners are weighing whether to sell the company.
lead_paragraph: The online video site said it now has four million paid subscribers, up from two million last year, even as two of its owners are weighing whether to sell the company.

headline.main: Hulu Says Number of Paid Subscribers Has Doubled
headline.print_headline: Hulu Says Number of Paid Subscribers Has Doubled
